participant_1.background:
I like to watch YouTube videos of other people barbecuing while I eat my food in the car.
i love video games.
Music is an important part of my life, and I love to listen to it when I'm working, relaxing, or just hanging out.
i like thomas the tank engine.
I love the feeling of being free to speak my mind, even if it is not always appropriate.

participant_2.background:
My family is proud of my decision to become a police officer.
I like to try new restaurants and my favorite place to eat recently is this new sushi place that just opened up.
I drive a Subaru Outback because it's a practical car for getting to the lake and for carrying all my books.
My best friend died in a car accident when we were in college.
my son was born completely blind.

content.text: What's your favorite type of music?
I like all types of music, but I really like country music. My favorite band is Eric Church.
What's your favorite thing to do in your free time?
I like to go to the lake and go fishing. I also like to play video games and watch YouTube videos.
What do you do for work?
I'm a police officer. I've been on the force for 5 years and I love it.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to be a police officer, but I'm not sure if I'm brave enough.
It's definitely a dangerous job, but it's also very rewarding. I get to help people and make a difference in the community.
That's awesome! I'm sure you're a great police officer.
Thanks! I try my best.
What's your favorite thing about being a police officer?
I love getting to help people and make a difference in their lives. I also love the camaraderie of being a part of a team.
That sounds really great. I'm glad you enjoy your job.
Thanks! I do.
What's your favorite thing to do with your son?
I love playing with him and taking him to the park. He's so much fun and he always makes me laugh.
That sounds really sweet. I'm sure he loves spending time with you too.
He does. He always tells me that I'm his best friend.
Aww, that's so cute! I'm glad you have such a great relationship with your son.
Thanks! I am too.
It was really nice talking to you.
You too! Hope to talk to you again soon.
